results.rule_description: No sensitive data stored in user_data
results.impact: Sensitive credentials in the user data can be leaked
results.resolution: Don't use sensitive data in the user data section

results.rule_description: Secret/sensitive data should not be exposed in plaintext.
results.impact: Sensitive data can be leaked to unauthorised people or systems.
results.resolution: Remove plaintext secrets and encrypt them within a secrets manager instead.
results.description: A potentially sensitive string was discovered within an attribute value.
